author: uink45
content: Hi, I was wondering what sort of tools are available for creating simulations for EVM. In particular, I would be interested in how OPCODES are executed in the stack and the effect of optimizing gas costs for each.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Goevmlab https://github.com/holiman/goevmlab contains a bunch of really cool tools to do evm stuff and state tests

author: uink45
content: I appreciate it guys, thanks a lot!
